name: Userfox
long_description: userfox is a SaaS product that helps companies improve user retention through welcome, inactivity and custom trigger based emails. We're building a company. Not a product, and certainly not a feature. We believe that making this clear matters. It sets expectations to ourselves and to our customers. We're based in sunny San Francisco, California.
one_liner: User retention as a service.  Drip email
